result.markdown: --- title: 'THE BRUNA LAB | University of Florida' # subtitle: 'University of Florida' page-layout: full --- :::: {layout="[ 38, 62 ]"} ::: {#first-column} **Research in our lab focuses primarily on these three topics: (1) the ecology and conservation of tropical biodiversity, (2) plant population dynamics and plant-animal interactions in fragmented tropical landscapes, and (3) the structure of scientific institutions and networks, and how these structures influence global patterns of scientific productivity.**     The Bruna Lab in the News. ::: ::: {#second-column} ![](./images/br174.jpg) ::: :::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} 5+5 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 10 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #| echo: false ``` :::
